trans-unit.source: Represents a layout control that aligns a bullet and another visual object.
trans-unit.target: 글머리 기호와 다른 시각적 개체를 맞추는 레이아웃 컨트롤을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: BulletDecorator has two content properties: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: BulletDecorator에 두 개의 콘텐츠 속성이: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> property defines the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> to use as a bullet.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>속성 정의 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>글머리 기호로 사용할.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> property defines a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> that visually aligns with the bullet.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>속성 정의 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>시각적 글머리 기호도 정렬 하는.</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> always aligns with the first line of text when the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object is a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>항상 텍스트의 첫 번째 줄으로 정렬 때 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>개체는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object is not a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> aligns to the center of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>개체가 아닙니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>의 가운데에 맞춰진는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>개체입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.TextBlock> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about layout of a BulletDecorator, see [How to: Create a BulletDecorator](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d9532e9a-a2a5-47b9-aa37-c36f841b34ae).
trans-unit.target: BulletDecorator의 레이아웃에 대 한 자세한 내용은 참조 [하는 방법: BulletDecorator 만들기](http://msdn.microsoft.com/en-us/d9532e9a-a2a5-47b9-aa37-c36f841b34ae)합니다.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows examples of BulletDecorator controls.
trans-unit.target: 다음 그림에는 BulletDecorator 컨트롤의 예제를 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: ![3 BulletDecorators: CheckBox, RadioButton, TextBox](~/add/media/bulletdecorator.png "3 BulletDecorators: CheckBox, RadioButton, TextBox")
trans-unit.target: ![3 BulletDecorators: 확인란, 라디오 단추, 텍스트 상자에 붙여넣습니다](~/add/media/bulletdecorator.png "3 BulletDecorators: 확인란, 라디오 단추, 텍스트 상자")

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the default content arrangement behavior for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 기본 콘텐츠 정렬 동작을 재정의 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The ArrangeOverride method determines the size and position of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> objects.
trans-unit.target: 크기와 위치를 결정 하는 ArrangeOverride 메서드는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>개체.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> is aligned vertically with the first line of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> content.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>의 첫 번째 줄으로 세로 맞춤는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>콘텐츠.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The available <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> to use to lay out the content of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 사용 가능한 <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> 의 콘텐츠를 레이아웃 하는 데는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The computed size of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 계산 된 크기는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the background color for a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 배경색을 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Background property defines the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> to use to fill the area within the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> 내부 영역을 채우는 데</xref:System.Windows.Media.Brush> Background 속성을 정의합니다.

trans-unit.source: For some parent layout elements, the area that is defined for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> may extend beyond its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> content.
trans-unit.target: 일부 부모 레이아웃 요소에 대해 정의 된 영역에 대 한는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>보다 커질 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>콘텐츠.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: For example, if the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> is the single child of a cell in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> control, the Background property applies to the whole cell.
trans-unit.target: 예를 들어 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>단일 자식 셀에는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>컨트롤 백그라운드 속성이 전체 셀에 적용 됩니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: This occurs because the content in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid> cell is stretched in all directions to fill the cell, by default.
trans-unit.target: 이 때문에 발생의 콘텐츠는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>셀을 기본적으로 셀을 채우기 위해 모든 방향으로 늘립니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Grid>

trans-unit.source: However, if you set the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>, the Background property only affects the actual content area of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.
trans-unit.target: 그러나 <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A>속성 <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> 의 실제 콘텐츠 영역에만 영향을 미칩니다 Background 속성을</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> 설정 하는 경우

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can enclose the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> element.
trans-unit.target: 묶을 수 있습니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>에 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel>요소.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Panel> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|, |
trans-unit.target: # # 종속성 속성 정보 | | | |-|-| | 식별자 필드 | | | 메타 데이터 속성이 `true`|, |

trans-unit.source: The background color for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child*> of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 배경색을는 <> </> *> 및 <> </> *>의 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 식별 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background*>종속성 속성입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 추가할 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the object to use as the bullet in a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 에 글머리 기호로 사용할 개체를 가져오거나 설정 합니다.는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The Bullet property is a content property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> control and defines the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> to display as a bullet for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> object.
trans-unit.target: 글머리 기호 속성은의 콘텐츠 속성은 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>제어 하 고 정의 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>에 대 한 글머리 기호로 표시할는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>개체.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: The bullet that is defined by setting the Bullet property to a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> is the first visual element in a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> control.
trans-unit.target: 글머리 기호 속성을 설정 하 여 정의 된 글머리 기호는 <xref:System.Windows.UIElement>에 시각적 첫 번째 요소는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>컨트롤.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement>

trans-unit.source: The single <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> element is the second visual element.
trans-unit.target: 단일 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>요소는 두 번째 시각적 요소입니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>

trans-unit.source: ## XAML Property Element Usage ``` ```
trans-unit.target: # # XAML 속성 요소 사용``` ```

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"></xref> to use as the bullet.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.UIElement"> </xref> 글머리 기호로 사용 하도록 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets the child element that is at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: 지정된 된 인덱스에 있는 자식 요소를 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: The visual child elements of a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> are the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: 시각적 자식 요소는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>됩니다는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>속성.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>

trans-unit.source: The specified index for the child element.
trans-unit.target: 자식 요소에 대해 지정한 인덱스입니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> child element that is at the specified index.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"> </xref> 지정된 된 인덱스에 있는 자식 요소입니다.

trans-unit.source: index is less than 0.
trans-unit.target: index0 보다 작습니다.

trans-unit.source: -or- index is greater than or equal to .
trans-unit.target: -또는- index 보다 크거나 같으면 합니다.

trans-unit.source: Gets an enumerator for the logical child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 요소의 논리 자식에 대 한 열거자를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The logical child elements for a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> control include the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>컨트롤을 포함 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>하 고 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> 에 대 한 논리적 자식 요소

trans-unit.source: If you set both properties, they are enumerated in the following order: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 다음과 같은 순서로 열거 속성을 모두 설정 하는 경우: <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of visual child elements is the same as the number of logical child elements.
trans-unit.target: 시각적 자식 요소의 수 논리 자식 요소의 수와 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: The enumerator that provides access to the logical child elements of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 논리적 자식 요소에 대 한 액세스를 제공 하는 열거자는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: Overrides the default measurement behavior for the objects of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 개체에 대 한 기본 측정 동작 재정의 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The upper <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> limit of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 위 <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> 의 제한 된 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The required <xref href="System.Windows.Size"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control, based on the size of its <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet*> and <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child*> objects.
trans-unit.target: 필요한 <xref href="System.Windows.Size"> </xref> 에 대 한는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> 의 크기에 따라 해당 <> </> *> 및 <> </> *> 개체입니다.

trans-unit.source: Renders the content of a <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 콘텐츠를 렌더링 한 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: This method creates a <xref:System.Windows.Rect> structure that is sized for the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> content.
trans-unit.target: 이 메서드가 만드는 <xref:System.Windows.Rect>에 대 한 크기가 지정 된 구조는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator>콘텐츠.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator> </xref:System.Windows.Rect>

trans-unit.source: This rectangular structure is displayed with the specified <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A> color and no border.
trans-unit.target: 이 사각형 구조가 표시 되는 지정 된 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A>색상과 테두리가 없습니다.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Background%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingContext"></xref> for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of visual child elements for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: 에 대 한 시각적 자식 요소의 수를 가져옵니다는 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref> 제어 합니다.

trans-unit.source: The VisualChildrenCount can be 0, 1, or 2.
trans-unit.target: 0, 1 또는 2는 VisualChildrenCount 될 수 있습니다.

trans-unit.source: If either the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> or a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> element is defined, the VisualChildrenCount is 1.
trans-unit.target: 경우는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>또는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>요소가 정의 되어는 VisualChildrenCount는 1.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: If both the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A> and a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> element are defined, the VisualChildrenCount is 2.
trans-unit.target: 모두는 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>및 <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A>를 요소 정의 VisualChildrenCount가 2.</xref:System.Windows.Controls.Decorator.Child%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator.Bullet%2A>

trans-unit.source: The number of visual child elements is the same as the number of logical child elements.
trans-unit.target: 시각적 자식 요소의 수 논리 자식 요소의 수와 같습니다.

trans-unit.source: The number of visual elements that are defined for the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 시각적 요소에 대해 정의 된 수의 <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.BulletDecorator"> </xref>합니다.

trans-unit.source: The default is 0.
trans-unit.target: 기본값은 0입니다.
